title: Pang Wan’S Anti-Mary Sue Notes: Working Hard Every Day To Become The Heroine!
alternative_title: Pang Wan Fan Mali Su Jishi: Meitian Du Zai Nuli Chengwei Nv Zhujiao! ; Pang Wan's Anti-Mary Sue Notes: Working Hard Every Day to Become the Heroine! ; Páng Wān Fǎn Mǎlì Sū Jìshì: Měitiān Dū Zài Nǔlì Chéngwéi Nǚ Zhǔjiǎo! ; 庞弯反玛丽苏记事:每天都在努力成为女主角！ ; 每天都在努力成为女主角！
status: Pang Wan Fan Mali Su Jishi: Meitian Du Zai Nuli Chengwei Nv Zhujiao! ; Pang Wan's Anti-Mary Sue Notes: Working Hard Every Day to Become the Heroine! ; Páng Wān Fǎn Mǎlì Sū Jìshì: Měitiān Dū Zài Nǔlì Chéngwéi Nǚ Zhǔjiǎo! ; 庞弯反玛丽苏记事:每天都在努力成为女主角！ ; 每天都在努力成为女主角！
description:
Description :
        Pang Wan's Anti-Mary Sue Notes: Working Hard Every Day to Become the Heroine!/://Pang Wan Fan Mali Su Jishi: Meitian Du Zai Nuli Chengwei Nv Zhujiao! at manhua websiteThe female protagonist from a Mary Sue world transmigrates into a martial arts world. Relying on the confidence from her "Mary Sue soul," she embarks on the martial arts path, hoping to find her destined true love. However, unexpectedly, people in the martial world describe her as a beautiful "femme fatale" who is as deadly as she is lovely!
